about_the_game:
An erotic point-and-click adventure game blending paranormal fantasy with military intrigue. Woo your squadmates, collect clues, and uncover the secrets of the Peach Hills Division!

In this world- individuals with special abilities are scouted to hone their talents at Peach Hills, a military training facility known for its competitive war games. Fame, fortune, and status await the squadrons that rise to the top, earning their places as elite special forces units.



You play as Jim- a fresh faced recruit of ordinary skill who somehow finds himself admitted to this prestigious institution. Jim must survive his day-to-day drills while also uncovering a sordid string of secrets, befriending supernatural entities, and courting the affection of a number of beautiful women.

  • - COMMAND respect and admiration by lending aid to your neighbors and friends
  • - EXPLORE the facilities of the Peach Hills and its surrounding environs
  • - UNCOVER the mysteries behind the paranormal incidents occurring on base

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit depictions of sexual interactions between consenting adults.

name: Peach Hills Division

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and Newer
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 880M, AMD Radeon R9 Series, or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
